[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Institute of Digital Marketing” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|color:%23000000|line_height:52px” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]Digital Consulting Pandit is one of the best institute of digital marketing based in Mumbai. We provide digital marketing programs ranging from basic to advance. Our programs are exclusively designed to equip the student with a 360-degree scenario of digital marketing & upgrade their professional skills for a better career or business growth.

If you are looking at leveraging Digital Marketing & Social Media for Brand Promotion, Lead Generation, and Customer Acquisition, here we have come up with top programs run by the institute of digital marketing: Online digital marketing course, Corporate Training & Institute Training programs.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator color=”black”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Online Training” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|color:%23000000|line_height:52px” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]Learn new skills, pursue your interests, or advance your career with our short digital marketing online courses. Learn how to set up campaigns, understand data analytics, and track emerging online marketing trends to market your business with the best online digital marketing courses.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

1 Day workshop on Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager Basic

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

1 Day workshop on Facebook and Instagram Marketing

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

1 Day workshop on Google Search Ads(SEM)

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

1 Day workshop on Google Ads(Advance)

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

1 Day workshop on Facebook(Advance)

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Complete Digital Marketing Course

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator color=”black”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Corporate Training” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|color:%23000000|line_height:52px” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]Corporate training or Workplace Learning is a system of activities designed to educate employees. It helps employees to obtain knowledge and skills to progress professionally and personally.

Our Digital Marketing Corporate Training is custom-designed to match your organizational goals.

 At Digital consulting Pandit we have a much-focused approach to training corporations. Our style of company training works on enhancing the individual capability of each team member. That’s done with the only purpose of equipping them with the confidence and capability to execute tasks without requiring any additional support. Our digital marketing corporate training program improves your team’s skill for high-level marketing positions with solid knowledge for the latest marketing tools, techniques & best industry practices. Our Corporate Training in emerging technologies of digital marketing is all set to transform the markets.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator color=”black”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Institute Training” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|color:%23000000|line_height:52px” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]We conduct the Institute level digital marketing training programs. These programs are designed and delivered by the top corporate trainer, speaker and coach; a strategist with 10+ Years of experience in the education industry and digital marketing field. In this program, we conduct an interactive & hand-on workshop for marketing & Business MBA Students. Our top digital marketing training institute experts help you & your students to improve their practical skills in digital marketing. We can cover a wide range of topics in our training programs, and create a customized curriculum to meet your needs. This program is exclusively designed for students who want to make their careers in the digital marketing field also it includes certification which will help students to get placed quickly at top marketing agencies.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator color=”black”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Why Choose Digital Consulting Pandit as Institute Of Digital Marketing?

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]Digital Consulting Pandit – Digital Marketing Institute in Mumbai offers certified digital marketing training with a career assistance program. The course syllabus is designed according to the Industry standards & requirement with Practical knowledge. Our primary goal is transforming students to experts by training them on Modules like SEO, SEM, PPC, SMM, Google Analytics & more.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Google Certified Trainers

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Offers crash course as per the requirement

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Interactive & hands-on practical session

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Covers all-digital the medium where you can promote your website or brand easily

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator color=”black”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Benefits of Training Services” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|color:%23000000|line_height:52px” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Discover the Professional in You

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Become an In-Demand Professional

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Increase Your Market Value

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

A Wide Range of Career Options

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Enhance Your Skills and Creativity

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Skill-Driven Industry
